ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: The authors acknowledge Martin Meijer and Alex Verkennis (Westerdijk Fungal Biodiversity Institute) for their technical assistance, and Bertus van den Burg (IMenz Bioengineering) for his comments. We also thank Jan Dijksterhuis and Frank Segers (Westerdijk Fungal Biodiversity Institute), and members of the Transport of Permeable Media group (Eindhoven University of Technology) for discussing the results of this paper. This research was supported by the Dutch Technology Foundation STW within the Netherlands Organization for Scientific Research (NWO) partly funded by the Ministry of Economic Affairs. Partners of this STW research project are Westerdijk Fungal Biodiversity Institute, Eindhoven University of Technology, TNO, Lambert van den Bosch, Stiho, Touchwood, and Regge Hout.
